Posts.Content: I had this, Good your going to surgeon, It could be blocked ducts many do get this.. But with me it was cancer in the ducts. Has a mastectomy, The surgeon just took out the ducts with a little tissue. Didn't have to have Chemo or radiation, just on femara. I know how you feel, I like to know things to. I do hope the best for you.
Posts.Title: Breast secrtions
